meanings.definition: Not filled or saturated with a particular quality or substance.
meanings.sent1: The blank canvas remained unimbued with any color.
meanings.sent2: The dry sponge was unimbued with water.
meanings.sent3: The unimbued cupcake looked sad without any frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her unimbued voice lacked emotion during the speech.
meanings.sent5: The unimbued garden lacked the vibrant colors of spring.

meanings.definition: Lacking a particular belief or attitude.
meanings.sent1: The unimbued student showed no interest in the subject.
meanings.sent2: His unimbued response indicated his indifference.
meanings.sent3: The unimbued cat refused to chase the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her unimbued expression revealed her skepticism.
meanings.sent5: The unimbued audience sat quietly, unimpressed by the performance.
